level.text: An Invitation for Bids (IFB) shall be advertised for at least fourteen (14) days before the date set for the receipt of bids, unless the Director determines in writing that it is appropriate to shorten the notice period to not less than three (3) days. The Director shall consider the following factors in determining whether it is appropriate to shorten a notice period:
